targets.rawSql:
SELECT SUM(Total) AS Total_Geral 
FROM (
      SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total 
       FROM ALTAREDE.OS 
          WHERE COD_TIPOSERVICO IN ('1', '3', '4', '9', '17') 
                AND STATUS = 'A' 
                      AND EXCLUIDO = 'N'
                          
                          UNION ALL
                          
SELECT COUNT(A.COD_PEDIDO) AS Total 
    FROM PEDIDO_INSTALACAO A
        LEFT JOIN CLIENTE B ON B.COD_CLIENTE = A.COD_CLIENTE 
            WHERE A.EXCLUIDO = 'N' 
                  AND A.STATUS IN ('P', 'L') 
                        AND B.COD_CLIENTE IS NOT NULL 
                              AND B.NOME IS NOT NULL
                              ) AS t

select count(*) as Baixados from ALTAREDE.OS 
where COD_TIPOSERVICO in ('1', '3', '4', '9', '17') and STATUS = 'F' and EXCLUIDO = 'N' and DATA_CONCLUSAO >='${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' and DATA_CONCLUSAO <='${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}'

UNION all

select count(*) as Baixados from ALTAREDE.PEDIDO_INSTALACAO
where STATUS = 'I' and DATA_INSTALACAO >='${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' and DATA_INSTALACAO <='${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}' and EXCLUIDO = 'N'

select count(*) as Aberos from ALTAREDE.OS 
where COD_TIPOSERVICO in ('1', '3', '4', '9', '17') and STATUS = 'A' and EXCLUIDO = 'N' and DATA_CADASTRO >='${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' and DATA_CADASTRO <='${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}'

UNION all

select count(*) as Total from ALTAREDE.PEDIDO_INSTALACAO
where STATUS = 'I' and DATA_GERACAO >='${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' and DATA_GERACAO <='${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}' and EXCLUIDO = 'N'

SELECT SUM(Total) AS Encaminhados FROM (
      SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total 
          FROM ALTAREDE.OS 
              WHERE COD_TIPOSERVICO IN ('1', '3', '4', '9', '17') 
                    AND EXCLUIDO = 'N' 
                          AND DATA_ENCAMINHAMENTO >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' 
                                AND DATA_ENCAMINHAMENTO <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}'
                                
                                    UNION ALL
                                    
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total 
    FROM ALTAREDE.PEDIDO_INSTALACAO
        WHERE DATA_ENCAMINHAMENTO >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' 
              AND DATA_ENCAMINHAMENTO <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}' 
                    AND EXCLUIDO = 'N'
                    ) AS t

SELECT 
    Data,
        SUM(Abertas) AS Abertas,
            SUM(Baixadas) AS Baixadas
            FROM (
                  -- Contagem de ordens abertas
                      SELECT 
                              DATE_FORMAT(DATA_CADASTRO, '%d/%m/%Y') AS Data, 
                                      COUNT(*) AS Abertas, 
                                              0 AS Baixadas
                                                  FROM ALTAREDE.OS 
                                                      WHERE COD_TIPOSERVICO IN ('1', '3', '4', '9', '17') 
                                                            AND STATUS = 'A' 
                                                                  AND EXCLUIDO = 'N' 
                                                                        AND DATA_CADASTRO >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' 
                                                                              AND DATA_CADASTRO <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}'
                                                                                  GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(DATA_CADASTRO, '%d/%m/%Y')
                                                                                  
                                                                                      UNION ALL
                                                                              
-- Contagem de pedidos de instala\u00e7\u00e3o gerados
SELECT 
DATE_FORMAT(DATA_GERACAO, '%d/%m/%Y') AS Data, 
        COUNT(*) AS Abertas, 
                0 AS Baixadas
                    FROM ALTAREDE.PEDIDO_INSTALACAO
                        WHERE STATUS = 'I' 
                              AND EXCLUIDO = 'N'
                                    AND DATA_GERACAO >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' 
                                          AND DATA_GERACAO <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}'
                                              GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(DATA_GERACAO, '%d/%m/%Y')
                                              
                                                  UNION ALL
                                                  
-- Contagem de ordens conclu\u00eddas (baixadas)
SELECT 
        DATE_FORMAT(DATA_CONCLUSAO, '%d/%m/%Y') AS Data, 
                0 AS Abertas, 
                        COUNT(*) AS Baixadas
                            FROM ALTAREDE.OS 
                                WHERE COD_TIPOSERVICO IN ('1', '3', '4', '9', '17') 
                                      AND STATUS = 'F' 
                                            AND EXCLUIDO = 'N' 
                                                  AND DATA_CONCLUSAO >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' 
                                                        AND DATA_CONCLUSAO <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}'
                                                            GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(DATA_CONCLUSAO, '%d/%m/%Y')
                                                            
                                                                UNION ALL
                                                                
-- Contagem de instala\u00e7\u00f5es conclu\u00eddas
SELECT 
        DATE_FORMAT(DATA_INSTALACAO, '%d/%m/%Y') AS Data, 
                0 AS Abertas, 
                        COUNT(*) AS Baixadas
                            FROM ALTAREDE.PEDIDO_INSTALACAO
                                WHERE STATUS = 'I' 
                                      AND EXCLUIDO = 'N'
                                            AND DATA_INSTALACAO >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' 
                                                  AND DATA_INSTALACAO <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}'
                                                      GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(DATA_INSTALACAO, '%d/%m/%Y')
                                                      
                                                      ) AS t
                                                      GROUP BY Data
                                                      ORDER BY STR_TO_DATE(Data,'%d/%m/%Y');

SELECT 
    Data,
        SUM(Abertas) AS Abertas,
        SUM(Baixadas) AS Baixadas
         FROM (
               -- Contagem de ordens abertas
                   SELECT 
                           DATE_FORMAT(DATA_CADASTRO, '%d/%m/%Y') AS Data, 
                                   COUNT(*) AS Abertas, 
                                           0 AS Baixadas
                                               FROM ALTAREDE.OS 
                                                   WHERE COD_TIPOSERVICO IN ('1', '3', '4', '9', '17') 
                                                         AND STATUS = 'A' 
                                                               AND EXCLUIDO = 'N' 
                                                                     AND DATA_CADASTRO >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' 
                                                                           AND DATA_CADASTRO <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}'
                                                                               GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(DATA_CADASTRO, '%d/%m/%Y')
                                                                               
                                                                                   UNION ALL
                                                                                   
-- Contagem de pedidos de instala\u00e7\u00e3o gerados
SELECT       
  DATE_FORMAT(DATA_GERACAO, '%d/%m/%Y') AS Data,
        COUNT(*) AS Abertas, 
                0 AS Baixadas
                    FROM ALTAREDE.PEDIDO_INSTALACAO
                        WHERE STATUS = 'I' 
                              AND EXCLUIDO = 'N'
                                    AND DATA_GERACAO >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' 
                                          AND DATA_GERACAO <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}'
                                              GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(DATA_GERACAO, '%d/%m/%Y')
                                                  
                                                  UNION ALL
                                                  
-- Contagem de ordens conclu\u00eddas (baixadas)
    SELECT 
            DATE_FORMAT(DATA_CONCLUSAO, '%d/%m/%Y') AS Data, 
                    0 AS Abertas, 
                            COUNT(*) AS Baixadas
                                FROM ALTAREDE.OS 
                                    WHERE COD_TIPOSERVICO IN ('1', '3', '4', '9', '17') 
                                          AND STATUS = 'F' 
                                                AND EXCLUIDO = 'N' 
                                                      AND DATA_CONCLUSAO >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' 
                                                            AND DATA_CONCLUSAO <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}'
                                                                GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(DATA_CONCLUSAO, '%d/%m/%Y')
                                                                
                                                                    UNION ALL
                                                                    
-- Contagem de instala\u00e7\u00f5es conclu\u00eddas
    SELECT 
            DATE_FORMAT(DATA_INSTALACAO, '%d/%m/%Y') AS Data, 
                    0 AS Abertas, 
                            COUNT(*) AS Baixadas
                                FROM ALTAREDE.PEDIDO_INSTALACAO
                                    WHERE STATUS = 'I' 
                                          AND EXCLUIDO = 'N'
                                                AND DATA_INSTALACAO >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' 
                                                      AND DATA_INSTALACAO <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}'
                                                          GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(DATA_INSTALACAO, '%d/%m/%Y')
                                                          ) AS t

SELECT 
    A.ID_OS AS PEDIDO,
        F.DESCRICAO AS SERVICO,  -- Pegando a descri\u00e7\u00e3o do servi\u00e7o
            A.LOGIN, 
                D.NOME AS CLIENTE, 
                    C.NOME AS ATENDENTE,  
                        E.NOME AS TECNICO, 
                            DATE_FORMAT(A.DATA_AGENDADA, '%d/%m/%Y') AS AGENDAMENTO 
                            FROM OS AS A 
                            LEFT JOIN ENDERECO_LOGIN AS B ON B.LOGIN = A.LOGIN
                            LEFT JOIN FUNCIONARIO AS C ON C.COD_FUNCIONARIO = A.COD_ATENDENTE
                            LEFT JOIN CLIENTE AS D ON D.COD_CLIENTE = A.COD_CLIENTE
                            LEFT JOIN FUNCIONARIO AS E ON E.COD_FUNCIONARIO = A.COD_TECNICO
                            LEFT JOIN TIPO_SERVICO AS F ON F.COD_TIPOSERVICO = A.COD_TIPOSERVICO
                            WHERE A.COD_TIPOSERVICO IN ('1', '3', '4', '9', '17') 
                              AND A.STATUS = 'A' 
                                AND A.EXCLUIDO = 'N'
                                  AND E.NOME IN (${tecnico})
                                  
                                  UNION ALL
              
SELECT 
    A.COD_PEDIDO AS PEDIDO, 
        'INSTALACAO' AS SERVICO,  -- Definindo \"INSTALACAO\" como servi\u00e7o fixo
            A.LOGIN, 
                D.NOME AS CLIENTE, 
                    C.NOME AS ATENDENTE, 
                        E.NOME AS TECNICO,  
                            DATE_FORMAT(A.DATA_PREVISTA, '%d/%m/%Y') AS AGENDAMENTO 
                            FROM PEDIDO_INSTALACAO AS A 
                             LEFT JOIN ENDERECO_LOGIN AS B ON B.LOGIN = A.LOGIN
                             LEFT JOIN FUNCIONARIO AS C ON C.COD_FUNCIONARIO = A.COD_VENDEDOR  
                             LEFT JOIN CLIENTE AS D ON D.COD_CLIENTE = A.COD_CLIENTE
                             LEFT JOIN FUNCIONARIO AS E ON E.COD_FUNCIONARIO = A.COD_TECNICO
                            WHERE A.EXCLUIDO = 'N' 
                              AND A.STATUS IN ('P', 'L') 
                              AND D.COD_CLIENTE IS NOT NULL 
                              AND D.NOME IS NOT NULL
                              AND E.NOME IN (${tecnico})

SELECT 
    A.ID_OS AS PEDIDO, 
        A.LOGIN, 
            D.NOME AS CLIENTE, 
                C.NOME AS ATENDENTE,  
                    E.NOME AS TECNICO 
                    FROM OS AS A 
                    LEFT JOIN ENDERECO_LOGIN AS B ON B.LOGIN = A.LOGIN
                    LEFT JOIN FUNCIONARIO AS C ON C.COD_FUNCIONARIO = A.COD_ATENDENTE
                    LEFT JOIN CLIENTE AS D ON D.COD_CLIENTE = A.COD_CLIENTE
                    LEFT JOIN FUNCIONARIO AS E ON E.COD_FUNCIONARIO = A.COD_TECNICO
                    WHERE A.COD_TIPOSERVICO IN ('1', '3', '4', '9', '17') 
                      AND A.STATUS = 'F' 
                        AND A.EXCLUIDO = 'N'
                          AND E.NOME IN (${tecnico})
                            AND A.DATA_CONCLUSAO >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' 
                              AND A.DATA_CONCLUSAO <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}'
                                
                                UNION ALL
                                
                                SELECT 
                                    A.COD_PEDIDO AS PEDIDO, 
                                        A.LOGIN, 
                                            D.NOME AS CLIENTE, 
                                                C.NOME AS ATENDENTE, 
                                                    E.NOME AS TECNICO  
                                                    FROM PEDIDO_INSTALACAO AS A 
                                                    LEFT JOIN ENDERECO_LOGIN AS B ON B.LOGIN = A.LOGIN
                                                    LEFT JOIN FUNCIONARIO AS C ON C.COD_FUNCIONARIO = A.COD_VENDEDOR  
                                                    LEFT JOIN CLIENTE AS D ON D.COD_CLIENTE = A.COD_CLIENTE
                                                    LEFT JOIN FUNCIONARIO AS E ON E.COD_FUNCIONARIO = A.COD_TECNICO
                                                    WHERE A.EXCLUIDO = 'N' 
                                                      AND A.STATUS = 'I' 
                                                        AND D.COD_CLIENTE IS NOT NULL 
                                                          AND D.NOME IS NOT NULL
                                                            AND E.NOME IN (${tecnico})
                                                              AND A.DATA_INSTALACAO >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' 
                                                                AND A.DATA_INSTALACAO <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}'

SELECT SUM(Total) AS Total_Geral 
FROM (
    SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total 
    FROM ALTAREDE.OS 
    WHERE COD_TIPOSERVICO IN ('1', '3', '4', '9', '17') 
      AND STATUS = 'A' 
      AND EXCLUIDO = 'N'

    UNION ALL

    SELECT COUNT(A.COD_PEDIDO) AS Total 
    FROM PEDIDO_INSTALACAO A
    LEFT JOIN CLIENTE B ON B.COD_CLIENTE = A.COD_CLIENTE 
    WHERE A.EXCLUIDO = 'N' 
      AND A.STATUS IN ('P', 'L') 
      AND B.COD_CLIENTE IS NOT NULL 
      AND B.NOME IS NOT NULL
) AS t;

select count(*) as Total from ALTAREDE.OS 
where COD_TIPOSERVICO in ('1', '3', '4', '9', '17') and STATUS = "F" and EXCLUIDO = "N" and DATA_CONCLUSAO >='${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' and DATA_CONCLUSAO <='${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}'

UNION all

select count(*) as Total from ALTAREDE.PEDIDO_INSTALACAO
where STATUS = 'I' and DATA_INSTALACAO >='${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' and DATA_INSTALACAO <='${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}' and EXCLUIDO = 'N'

select count(*) as Total from ALTAREDE.OS 
where COD_TIPOSERVICO in ('1', '3', '4', '9', '17') and STATUS = "A" and EXCLUIDO = "N" and DATA_CADASTRO >='${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' and DATA_CADASTRO <='${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}'

UNION all

select count(*) as Total from ALTAREDE.PEDIDO_INSTALACAO
where STATUS = 'I' and DATA_GERACAO >='${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' and DATA_GERACAO <='${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}' and EXCLUIDO = 'N'

SELECT SUM(Total) AS Total_Geral FROM (
    SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total 
    FROM ALTAREDE.OS 
    WHERE COD_TIPOSERVICO IN ('1', '3', '4', '9', '17') 
      AND EXCLUIDO = "N" 
      AND DATA_ENCAMINHAMENTO >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' 
      AND DATA_ENCAMINHAMENTO <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}'

    UNION ALL

    SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total 
    FROM ALTAREDE.PEDIDO_INSTALACAO
    WHERE DATA_ENCAMINHAMENTO >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00}' 
      AND DATA_ENCAMINHAMENTO <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD 23:59:59}' 
      AND EXCLUIDO = 'N'
) AS t;

list.definition:
select a.NOME from FUNCIONARIO as a
join FUNCAO_FUNCIONARIO as b on b.COD_FUNCIONARIO = a.COD_FUNCIONARIO
group by a.NOME
list.label: tecnico
list.name: tecnico
list.query:
select a.NOME from FUNCIONARIO as a
join FUNCAO_FUNCIONARIO as b on b.COD_FUNCIONARIO = a.COD_FUNCIONARIO
group by a.NOME
